ctl:form.p: The Web Coverage Service tests scripts are designed to test WCS 2.0 implementations based on the WCS 2.0 specifications.
A complete list of tests in the test suite are available in OGC 09-110r4 document, but note that not all of the tests are applicable to all servers.
1. The implementation provides at least two coverages.
2. The first coverage offering should be RectifiedGridCoverage with at least 2 dimensions, while the second coverage could be any coverage.
3. Do not use CoverageId_Bogus as a coverage ID, do not use Axis_Bogus as a axis label.
4. The offered coverage must be implementd according to GMLCov specification.
